name: Nihil: The Watcher Visual Novel
description:
A camping trip rooted deep in our memories...

Nihil: The Watcher is written by algol_ardhanari, drawn and programmed by BlueStylus, and inspired by The Echo Project.

To read more Nihil, check out the full story on Archive of our Own.

To support the development of a full visual novel, visit our Patreon!

Join our Discord server (18+ only please, for your safety and for ours): https://discord.gg/nihilthestory

Thank you for playing. <3 Leave a donation if you want to see more Nihil!
